name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with (Supernova) other than [Monkey D. Luffy] add it to your hand. Then place the rest of the cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with (Supernova) other than [Monkey D. Luffy] add it to your hand. Then place the rest of the cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
